product.title: Charlotte Pipe 1-1/2-in x 10-ft 330 Psi Schedule 40 PVC Pipe
feature_bullets: Dual marked for DWV and Pressure applications
For use where systems will not exceed 140° F
PVC Schedule 40 Pipe is used in irrigation, underground sprinkler systems, swim pools, outdoor aplications and cold water supply lines
